Help: Uppdatera en forskningsfinansiär

---
!contents -R2 -g -p -f -h
!1 Testar uppdatering av forskningsfinansiär
Det ska vara möjligt att uppdatera forskningsfinansiär via REST API.

Testet visar att adminanvändare har möjlighet att uppdatera forskningsfinansiärsposten

Först skapar vi en forskningsfinansiär, för att sedan kunna uppdatera den

!***> Skapa en post

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | json | testCreateRecordCreatedType? | getStatusType? | getCreatedId? |
| $everythingAuthToken | funder | {"children":[{"children":[{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"system"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"diva"}],"name":"dataDivider"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"validationType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"funder"}],"name":"validationType"}],"name":"recordInfo"},{"name":"funderName","attributes":{"language":"swe"},"value":"Fitnesse  funder to be  deleted"},{"name":"funderName","attributes":{"language":"eng"},"value":"Fitnesse  funder to be  deleted"},{"name":"funderAcronym","value":"FFD"},{"name":"funderRegistrationNumber","value":"12365-98753521"},{"name":"funderDOI","value":"01"},{"name":"funderClosed","value":"2010-01-01"}],"name":"funder"} | funder | CREATED | $createdId= |

*!
!***> Uppdatera med ny huvudtitel

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | json | testUpdateRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | funder | $createdId | {"children":[{"children":[{"name":"id","value":"$createdId"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"recordType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"funder"}],"name":"type"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"user"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"coraUser:4412982402853626"}],"name":"createdBy"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"system"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"diva"}],"name":"dataDivider"},{"name":"tsCreated","value":"2020-09-01T13:39:53.992463Z"},{"repeatId":"0","children":[{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"user"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"coraUser:4412982402853626"}],"name":"updatedBy"},{"name":"tsUpdated","value":"2020-09-01T13:39:53.992463Z"}],"name":"updated"},{"children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"validationType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"funder"}],"name":"validationType"}],"name":"recordInfo"},{"name":"funderName","attributes":{"language":"swe"},"value":"Ny huvudtitel"}],"name":"funder"} | | OK |

*!
!*** Läs  den uppdaterade posten för att se att den är uppdaterad

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $everythingAuthToken | funder | $createdId | =~/"value":"Ny huvudtitel"/ | OK |
